327840.name: QR Champions: Jump Start Tournament
327840.description:
Jump Start into the Challenge!

A hard racing sports becomes more and more popular in the universe. Hundereds have risked their lives in brutal races to experience the ultimate speed rush and to feel the thrill of deadly fights.

Take part in the fast and dangerous competitions and tournaments of the exclusive Early Access campaign "Jump Start Tournaments"!

Become one of the first Quantum Rush: Champions!

Content

This DLC adds the "Jump Start Tournament" campaign of the Early Access version of Quanum Rush Champions to your game. It is accessible to all 3 racer manufacturers and offers 5 tiers with many challenges, boss fights and unlocks, wich are available only in this DLC!

  • over 180 parts and colors for your racers
  • over 80 challenges
  • 5 mercyless boss fights
327840.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语*, 法语*, 意大利语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
